recipesJson.name: Captain Oh Captain!
recipesJson.author: Daytimefrank1
recipesJson.description: Not completely your typical rum and coke. MB captain rum is pretty darn authentic to Captain Morgan spiced rum with just the right amount of boozy notes. The lime is present in the back like you want it to be and FLV cola assists with the citrus note. WF rum and cola help with the rum and sweetness of a cola. Swirl rounds out any sharpness. Soho you ask? WTF is soho doing in this mix? It darkens the rum a little more and gives it a dirty note that I wanted like drinking in a Caribbean bar.
